name: UInputTriggerHold
doc:
UInputTriggerHold
      Trigger fires once input has remained actuated for HoldTimeThreshold seconds.
      Trigger may optionally fire once, or repeatedly fire.

HoldTimeThreshold: How long does the input have to be held to cause trigger?
bIsOneShot: Should this trigger fire only once, or fire every frame once the hold time threshold is met?
